title: Slider-Controlled Image Comparison
description: Shows different images based on slider value (e.g., before/after).
use_case: Comparing two states, such as before-and-after.
storyline_instructions: Add as a JavaScript trigger when slider variable changes.

variables.name: ImageState
variables.description: String to trigger different image states (e.g., 'Before', 'After').

notes: Configure Storyline to show images based on ImageState variable.
